Author: RosieNP
Text: I'm a psychiatric nurse practitioner. Seroquel can stimulate appetite (but if it works it may be worth it). But there are alternatives that are more weight neutral. Latuda is one, but you have to take it with at least 300 cals for it to work. Another is Vraylar (which I take myself), but insurance may not cover it. Ask your provider...

Author: heyfringe
Text: I’m surprised you’re awake! Those meds made me sleep for 16-18 hours a day. It did work for my bipolar but it wasn’t sustainable for me. I ended up switching to something else where I’m not as tired and unfocused.   Good luck!
